amendment.description: To require an annual report on the costs incurred by the Department of Defense in implementing or supporting resolutions of the United Nations Security Council.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2527 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2527 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12779-12780) To require an annual report on the costs incurred by the Department of Defense in implementing or supporting resolutions of the United Nations Security Council.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2527 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2527 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
